name: Somotion Studios
summary: Working with one of our favorite Raleigh animation and design mavens, Sophia Cipriano, we built a lightweight animated website experience to showcase her talents and projects.
specs: custom WordPress them build, fullpage.js, js animations

image.alt: responsive mockups for Somotion Studios website

name: Story in a Bottle Wines
summary: This newly opened Bellevue wine store needed an online store + home to support it's growth and sales. We built an integration between web store and brick+mortar point-of-sale system, and are creating custom rules for the ecommerce store + perfecting the site experience for customers.
specs: UX, POS API integration, custom Woocommerce rules, maintenance

name: lucettegrace patisserie
summary: This contemporary patisserie wanted to both modernize their web presence and build better systems for catering orders + special events. We designed a sleek site to evoke the feels of this modern cafe, and built an e-commerce shop to allow customers to order read-to-pickup treats + lunch, place one-time catering orders, and added a workflow for reoccurring catering + extra special occasions.
specs: WordPress child theme, custom e-commerce workflows + backend rules

name: Jessica Harika
type: UX concept + page design, development, maintenance, hosting
summary: Jessica Harika is a classically trained opera singer and director, currently working in NYC. She recently had a new brand designed and wanted a more advanced portfolio to display her growing resume of singing, directing, and producing performances.
specs: UX concepting + page design, custom WordPress theme build

name: Elevate Land Group
summary: We partnered with a designer to bring a sleek sales site to life for this boutique development firm, to showcase their growing portfolio of available land and properties in the mountains of NC.

name: Law Offices of Kevin B. Long
summary: We build a quick landing page for this new Raleigh defense firm, and are working with the client and team to develop a content strategy and more robust educational website.

name: Law Offices of Kevin B. Long
type: PM, design, development, content + SEO strategy

name: RGA Investments
summary: This long-time hosting client came to us to update their web presence to accommodate their ever-growing client base. We facilitated new copy, strategized UX, and built a custom site to showcase + house their content plans.
partners: yellowdog:creative, rebrand + web design; Cinema Dolce, video
specs: UX, custom Wordpress theme, js, automations, maintenance, hosting
